desc: Tiffanyâ€™s Salon provides a variety of salon packages. Prices vary based on the combination of services and the number of clients included. Sample packages are listed below.

prices.productDesc: This package is designed for the Bride and her party, or the special young lady celebrating her prom or homecoming. The package may include hair, eyebrow treatment, makeup, massage, and mini mani/pedi with optional polish. These services may be provided on or off-site.
Designed for the Groom and his party this package may include a haircut or clean-up and style, touch-up of nails, and neck, back, and shoulder massage.  These services may be provided on or off-site.

items.title: Mother/Daughter Time
items.itemDesc: This package provides quality salon time together for moms and their daughters.  This package includes mini mani/pedi with optional polish, a targeted 15-minute tension relieving massage, and a facial.

items.title: A Package For Him
items.itemDesc: This package provides a 15 minutes targeted tension relieving massage, haircut or trim, eyebrow trim or wax, and nail trim and file.
